Original Passport (Validity should be at least 06 Months from the date of departure) Recent 3.5 cm x 4.5 cm size photo with white background 2 Copy Visiting Card & National ID Card N.O.C / G.O / Trade License Notarized Copy with Translate in English & Letterhead PadOriginal Bank statement for last six months . Minimum Balance Taka 60,000/-for Single Entry,500,000/-for Multiple Entry,Bank Solvency Certificate ,Student ID Card for Student (if child travel with parent ) Birth Certificate for Infant (if child travel with parent ) Marriage Certificate (only for newly married couple )
